sentences.english: Dedicated specifically for the preservation of the remains of the Living Buddha Stupa.
sentences.chinese: 靈塔，專門用於保存活佛遺體的佛塔。

sentences.english: So we named it Qiling pagoda.
We think he went off north to the Wailing Ziggurat.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲他向北去哀嚎通靈塔了。

sentences.english: G1: Particularly the eight tombs of Dalai. They really fascinate me.
sentences.chinese: 特別是八座靈塔殿，它們讓我着迷。

definition: Jianzhen or Ganjin (688-763), Tang dynastic Buddhist monk, who crossed to Japan after several unsuccessful attempts, influential in Japanese Buddhism
Buddha/Buddhist stupa (transliteration of Pali thupo)/also written 浮屠
pipal tree (Ficus religiosa)/bo fig tree/Bodhi tree (sacred to Buddhism and Hinduism)
Qingyun county in Dezhou 德州[De2 zhou1], Shandong
the Baima or White Horse Temple in Luoyang, one of the earliest Buddhist temples in China
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
Mt Maiji Caves at Tianshui 天水, Gansu
Emperor Ming of Han (28-75), Western Han Dynasty Emperor 58-75
